Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI

Class GUICloud

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.GUICloud
public class GUICloud extends Object
Class GUICloud renders the cloud's elements on the screen For each cloud, a GUICloud instance is created
